text: The FDA has taken action against more than 70 websites selling various versions of opioid drugs, including tramdol, so far this summer. Some of the drugs they're selling are actually a dangerous form of pressed fentanyl, the FDA said. https://www.cnbc.com/2018/08/28/fda-directs-websites-to-stop-illegally-selling-opioids-online.html
